QuestData.Title: Resisting Arrest
QuestData.Description:
Your findings do not disappoint, $n.
Make your way to the soul engine and use our newly acquired weapons to dismantle the power source.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the withered to dismantle the Power Source inside the Soul Engine at Felsoul Hold.
QuestData.CompletionText: There is much to be done.
QuestData.RewardText: Oculeth will be quite pleased with your findings. As you know, he's been working diligently on a new device for the withered.
